title: Hero Corp
resume: Hero Corp is a French comedic science fiction TV show that has aired 30 episodes over 2 seasons, beginning in October 2008 on the cable channel Comédie!. In July 2009 it began broadcasting on France 4. The show was created by and stars Simon Astier, previously seen in the Kaamelott TV show. In August 2012, France 4 announced that the show will come back for a third season, airing in 2013.
character: Burt « Acid Man »/ « Captain Shampooing »/ « Tornado »
